name: Rordon Gamsay's EXTREME COOKING ADVENTURE: Tower of Trials
name_original: Rordon Gamsay's EXTREME COOKING ADVENTURE: Tower of Trials
description:
Use tab to pause in the web version to not exit full screen. 

Everyone loves their grandmother, even if she has a sweet-tooth. So when grandma wants something delicious, what else is there to do than venture out to gather ingredients for a scrumptious delicacy for dear little grandma? 

Grab your basket and venture forth on this epic adventure in master-chef Rordon Gamsay's Tower of Trials for an EXTREME COOKING ADVENTURE! 

Can you collect good enough ingredients for a delicious meal? Can you hold onto these ingredients until you reach the kitchen at the very top? And will you have what it takes to see through your recipe to completion? 

But most importantly...

Will you make grandma proud?

Jury Choice Award Winner!!!

git: https://github.com/taccck/GameProject1

git download: https://github.com/taccck/GameProject1/releases/tag/1.
